name: Subject-78
description:
WARNING!

This game contains lots of boxes.If you are allergic to boxes, do not download this game

This game was made by BulletEX company to advertise their products.

Boxes can be used in many different situations, but this game shows us boxes as a shields, protection.

The Main Character(Whoose name is unknown) was just a basic human living in cell of BulletEX company, but one day, his life has changed greatly.It was April 20, 2069 year.MC wakes up.Radio is playing.It was just like any other day.U N T I L   I T   W A S N ' T.MC was picked as a test subject for today.He was shocked, because it was his first time, and probably the last.But anyway, he went to next room, and listened to a boring, long instructions.After that, he finally grabs his box and takes a deep breath of a fresh air.

...

Actually, he forgor that there is no air and

FUCKING DIED.

Well that was a totally-true story that happend in real life.If you think that MC in that story was dumb you can play this free game and change his fate...or not.

You can buy yourself a MK-2 Bullet Protecting Cube "Cross" on our website only for $14,88!!!Or you can buy a MK-3 Bullet Protecting Cube "Companion" for a small price of $133,7!

Our website: www.notavirus.com
